title: The Dream Travelers' Society: Volume. 1
description: Leanne is a normal teenage girl. She has hopes and dreams like we all did. However, something special is going on with her. She is part of an elite group. Follow along with Leanne as she learns that the "Dream Travelers' Society" can do a whole lot more than time travel to save the timeline. This is the first book; an introduction into a whole new sci-fi series!
author: Christy K. Cagle
